songs.title: Bagan Dhaladhe
songs.lyrics:
Bagan Dhaladhe Addunyaa Kana Miladhee
 Bar ani nama addaadha fakkaattiin kos waaqayyoodha 
 
 Qaamni koo otoo hin suphamiin 
 Lafeen kos wal sassaabee 
 Durii dursitee naaf yaaddeettaa 
 Qooda kos Qopheessiteettaa 
 Baroonni Guyyoonni koo 
 Dura ket Barraa'oodha 
Dogongoraan waan Hin Taaneef Karoora keen Jiraadhaa
